subject: Order #SSN5472
description_text:
Hello,


Is there a problem with my order #SSN5472? I placed the order on December
29, and it is now January 3, but I still haven’t seen any updates.


Thank you for keeping me informed.

Orders
<https://account.simsonn.com/orders>

conversations.body_text: Hi gura gustav123,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.
